member.name: T:mop.Calculator.AddCalculator`1
member.summary: Simple calculator to perform operations on a given type

member.name: M:mop.Calculator.AddCalculator`1.Calculate(`0,`0)
member.summary: Adds two values of the same type. Does not check for overflows

member.summary: Calculator to perform operations on a given type. It throws an OverflowException, where applicable

member.summary: Adds two values of the same type.
